sub_title: Sr.Credit Risk Consultant Rural – at Rabobank
summary:
15+years professional experience after graduating from Bogazici University MSc.Financial Engineering and BA.Economics departments and currently studying at Technical University of Munich MSc.BioEconomics. Worked in Reporting (MI Reporting,Strategic Planning) and Change (Management Consultancy,Change Management) areas and currently covering Risk management tasks. Sharing sustainability concerns about the World’s future and want to be part of iniatives to support environmental well being.

Key Experience:
-	understand C-Level reporting needs
-	produce qualified analysis reports, 3-years plans, actual vs. target comparison, product and segment analysis 
-	strategic decision making process related activities like new branch opening analysis, investment analysis, etc.
-	Strategic Projects: NPL Sale activity, Bank Strategic Change Program, TOM alignment, Bankassurance business frameworks re-design and Credit Card / POS business management re-design project, PRA Stress Testing
-	Implementation Projects: MI reporting re-design, Core Banking and Credit Card system solution design, Basel Capital Adequacy Reporting and Liquidity Reporting system implementation and IFRS9 implementation projects
-	Notional understanding on treasury products like bonds, options, derivatives, financial risk modelling, and econometric/statistical analysis through Financial Engineering degree

Key Deliverables:
-	Strategy design for different part of bank
-	New Reporting Frameworks and management reporting
-	Scorecard/provision model governance
-	Project delivery and tool implementation 

Key Strengths:
-	Long years of banking experience with wide coverage
-	Business Consultancy notion
-	Project Management experience 
-	Master in Financial Engineering 
-	C-Level engagement and wide stakeholder management
-	Analytical mind-set
-	Easy to plug-in into the team work and new team environments

I am interested with opportunities in environments with high learning potential and business dynamism with international touch points.

profile_positions.description:

•	Coordination with IT for implementations for developed models
•	Being part of internal committees for CoSAS portfolio
profile_positions.title: Credit Risk Manager / Complex Structure Assessment System (CoSAS) Portfolio, Credit Risk

Governance activities for all scorecard models and provision models together with analytic reporting and ad-hoc project management within Retail Risk framework. Key project delivery and involvement like IFRS9, Future Core Banking, etc. .

•	IFRS 9 provision model management
•	IFRS9 provision montly process management for PRA and BDDK

•	Ad-Hoc report management and project delivery
•	SAS based report generation and SAS Code maintainance  (provision, scorecards, income model, ad-hoc reports,etc)
•	Data Quality Management for all data used in model and reporting

profile_positions.title: Manager - Finance Strategy & Change Management

profile_positions.description:
Project IV – Bankassurance Redesign Program in Large Turkish Bank – Con’t:
• Project Management activities in program and project level
• Correlation Analysis study between credit risk score and underwriting score
• Leading Data Management and Performance Management & MIS related projects

Project III – Payment Processing Solution Implementation in Leading Turkish Bank – 4 Months:
• High level review of credit card payment processing infrastructure 
• Evaluation and design of ‘Customer Limit’ process alternatives in business POV 
• Review of existing ‘Retention’ structure and determination of improvement areas
• Restructure of DWH capabilities for ‘Campaign Management’, ‘Limit’, and ‘Retention’ subjects
• Design of credit card campaign management structure with extended capabilities allowing ease of adaptation for future opportunities driven by technology and customer demands
• Presenting project deliverables to middle and top management audience 

Project II – Effective POS Stock Management in Leading Turkish Bank – 2 months:
• Understanding of existing processes of the business together with improvement areas
• Identification of data and database tool requirement in terms of POS stock management
• Design of high level To-Be processes and related screen requirements
• Discovering technologic enablers (like Smart phone POS, RFID, Remote Services, etc.) available for the banking sector specifically in POS and credit card business 
• Creation of action plan and high level road map, and presenting the results to top management

Project I – Business Process Reengineering for Money Transfers in Leading Turkish Bank – 6 months:
• Understanding of existing structure and market dynamics together with customer demands
• Design of To Be EFT, FX Transfer and Internal money transfer process structures together with improvement areas in terms of usability, and modularity
• Delivery of high level business requirements and detailed level IT requirements
profile_positions.title: Senior Management Consultant

profile_positions.description:
I was working in Strategic Planning and Project Management department directly reporting CEO. Main purpose of the team was:
• Maintenance and management of 5 year business plan based on complex model prepared by advisory firm,
• Creation of bank change management program and design of high level roadmap to enable change
• Joining implementation activities of sub-projects including process designs, HR policy creation, and other related items parallel to 5-year plan 
• Peer compression reports based on weekly, monthly and quarterly data
• Following macro conditions, advisory strategy reports and strategic movements in the market
• Responding ad-hoc requests from top management and other departments within decision making procedures
profile_positions.title: Manager - Strategic Planning and Project Management

profile_positions.description:
I was working in Yapı Kredi MIS & Business Planning Group under Financial Planning and Control Department. Main purpose of the team is:
• Preparing monthly reports for top management in Strategic Business Level
• Responding ad-hoc requests from top management and other departments within decision making procedures 
• Creating yearly budgets in Strategic Business Level and branch level and 3-5 year strategic plans
• Monitoring more than 800+ branches all around Turkey with MIS reports in monthly base
• Maintaining daily, weekly and monthly monitoring tools,
• Working closely with IT departments and Data warehouse team
• Treasury reporting and FTP reporting for the bank
I was also responsible with implementation of new Oracle based budgeting tool, Hyperion and implementation of ALMPro FTP calculation tool, a product of Prometeia IT company.
